summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 CHRYSLER 200. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V668000 (SEAT BELTS, AIR BAGS). THE PART TO DO THE REPAIR WAS UNAVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE CONTACT SPOKE WITH THE DEALER (LANDMARK CHRYSLER DODGE JEEP RAM OF ATLANTA 5745 PEACHTREE INDUSTRIAL BLVD, ATLANTA, GA 30341) WHO STATED THAT PARTS WERE NOT AVAILABLE AND THEY WERE WAITING FOR THE MANUFACTURER TO SEND PARTS. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE AND STATED THAT PARTS WOULD BE AVAILABLE IN JANUARY AND MARCH. WHEN CONTACTED AGAIN, THE MANUFACTURER STATED THAT PARTS WOULD BE AVAILABLE IN JUNE; HOWEVER, PARTS WERE NOT AVAILABLE IN JUNE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.
